WRITING.TEXT: Cool idea, it would create a nice splatter effect when it burst onto the page.
I will try and make it available as a print soon and let you know :)
Thanks, I was torn on whether to extend the ground all the way across , fear of ruining it got the better of me :/
Thanks, will do!
Thanks, I'll hopefully be making prints available soon.

Just watercolour. I started in watercolour many years ago, then found acrylic then oil, then pencil. I kinda dropped off using watercolour because I enjoyed the other mediums more. Now I've found a renewed interest in it, it is just such a different experience.

I'm no expert on watercolour but for finer details use a finer brush with very little water, don't paint wet on wet and work from light to dark. I worked very delicately on the girl because like you said, it can go bad very quickly. Its also becoming my favourite medium. Happy painting!
I live in Australia and only finished this yesterday so...Sorry I can't help you!
This was inspired by my 2 daughters. Thankfully I haven't lost what you've described, they keep me young I guess.
Thats really cool, Its why I love art so much. It can conjure up weird, beautiful, sometimes deep rooted emotions.
Sorry :(
Thankyou :)
Cool, I have 2 daughters and I guess they inspired this.

You're right, it definitely didn't turn out the way I intended. It got to a point though, where I realised exactly what you were saying, that the head was much darker almost sinister but being watercolor you have to work quickly and don't have the luxury of sitting back and observing and making changes. I should have started lighter on the head rather than strong darker blues and purples. All a good learning experience :)
Heh, thanks :)
Thanks, this definitely didn't turn out how I imagined in my head I wanted it to be much lighter and floaty (if that makes sense) All a learning experience :)
Thanks heaps and you're completely right about the lips, it didnt even register until I finished that they were closed :/
Thanks! I really dig that piece.
Thanks, I probably walked into it with my title, but what can you do. People are easily amused :) I'm not sure on the exact amount of hours but I finished it in a day.
Well, thankyou :)
Thanks!
